div.span: All Children under 18 or Parents/Guardians of children under age 18 may pick up to-go breakfast and lunch meals at the Elementary Cafeteria door from 9-11 Monday - Thursday (Friday's meals will be distributed Thursday). Please take advantage of this service and pickup meals for your children under 18! Stay safe.
